block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Placed INF Jose Offerman on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B-DH Morgan Burkhart from Pawtucket of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed 3B Olmedo Saenz on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 2B Jose Ortiz from Sacramento of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed 2B Homer Bush on the 15-day disabled list.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Placed INF Jose Offerman on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B-DH Morgan Burkhart from Pawtucket of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed 3B Olmedo Saenz on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 2B Jose Ortiz from Sacramento of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed 2B Homer Bush on the 15-day disabled list.
National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Optioned 1B Erubial Drazo to Tucson of the PCL. Recalled OF Jason Conti from Tucson.

National Basketball Association DALLAS MAVERICKS--Re-signed G Hubert Davis and F Gary Trent. INDIANA PACERS--Re-signed F-C Sam Perkins to a one-year contract. MIAMI HEAT--Acquired G Eddie Jones, F Anthony Mason, G Ricky Davis and G-F Dale Ellis from the Charlotte Hornets for F P.J. Brown, G Jamal Mashburn, F-C Otis Thorpe, G Tim James and G Rodney Buford. Re-signed G Anthony Carter to a one-year contract. NEW YORK KNICKS--Re-signed F Kurt Thomas.
National Football League DALLAS COWBOYS--Signed OL J.R. Conrad and OG Steve Scifres. ST. LOUIS RAMS--Signed P Louie Aguiar to a one-year contract.

National Hockey League BUFFALO SABRES--Re-signed D Jason Woolley to a one-year contract. CALGARY FLAMES--Named Don Hay coach. CAROLINA HURRICANES--Signed F Bates Battaglia, F Sandy McCarthy, D Steve Halko, C Byron Ritchie, C Greg Koehler and RW Shane Willis. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Agreed to terms with F Krzysztof Oliwa on a two-year contract. Signed F Steve Heinze, F Geoff Sanderson and F Matt Davidson. FLORIDA PANTHERS--Signed RW David Emma and D Michel Periard. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Agreed to terms with F Brian Savage on a one-year contract. OTTAWA SENATORS--Named Roger Neilson assistant coach. Agreed to terms with F Magnus Arvedson, D Chris Phillips, D Shane Hnidy, RW Ivan Ciernik and C John Emmons on one-year contracts. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed D Justin Hocking to a one-year contract. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Re-signed F Jonas Hoglund, F Yanic Perreault and F Alyn McCauley to one-year contracts.
